dashboard.title: COD Manager Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your Cash on Delivery settings and monitor performance

embedWidget.title: Enable the app embed
embedWidget.description: Make the app visible on your store from the Theme Customizer. This allows customers to see and use the COD option during checkout.
embedWidget.helpText: This step is required for the app to function properly on your storefront.

configureCod.title: Configure COD settings
configureCod.description: Configure all your app settings including pixels tracking, integrations, visibility controls, protection rules, and general COD settings like fees, availability zones, and order limits.
configureCod.helpText: You can always come back and modify these settings later.

customizeForm.title: Customize the COD Form
customizeForm.description: Personalize the fields, appearance, and validation rules of your COD form to match your brand.
customizeForm.helpText: Customization helps build trust with your customers and improves conversion rates.

liveChat.title: Live Chat Support
liveChat.description: Get instant help from our support team

orderProcessing.title: Order Processing
orderProcessing.description: Configure how orders are created and processed.

saveUtmParameters.label: Save UTM tracking parameters in order notes

addOrderTag.label: Add 'releasit_cod_form' tag to new orders
addOrderTag.helpText: Useful for filtering and automating workflows.

formBehavior.title: Form Behavior
formBehavior.description: Customize how the form appears to customers.

disableShopifyDiscounts.label: Disable Shopify automatic discounts on the form

disableAutofill.label: Disable browser autofill and autocomplete
disableAutofill.helpText: Can prevent incorrect information but adds friction.

trimLeadingZeroPhone.label: Remove leading zero from phone numbers

afterPurchase.title: After-Purchase Experience
afterPurchase.description: Define what happens after customers place an order.

custom.label: Custom redirect URL
custom.helpText: Redirect to your own upsell/thank you page.

whatsapp.label: WhatsApp conversation
whatsapp.helpText: Start a WhatsApp chat with a pre-filled message.

message.label: Custom message overlay
message.helpText: Display a message without leaving the page.

customRedirectUrl.label: Custom Redirect URL
customRedirectUrl.helpText: Must be a valid URL starting with https://

whatsappPhone.label: WhatsApp Phone Number
whatsappPhone.helpText: Include country code without '+' (e.g., 213 for Algeria).

whatsappMessage.label: WhatsApp Message
whatsappMessage.helpText: Use {order_id} to include the order number.

customThankYouMessage.label: Custom Thank You Message
customThankYouMessage.helpText: This message is displayed to customers after they order.

resetData.title: Reset All App Data
resetData.description: This will completely reset your entire application database — all orders, customers, settings, and configurations will be permanently deleted. This is equivalent to a fresh installation.
resetData.warning: WARNING: This will delete ALL your app data permanently!
resetData.warningDetails: This includes: orders, customers, logs, webhooks, and all settings. This action cannot be undone.

messages.dataReset: All app data has been reset to factory defaults. The application has been completely reinitialized.
messages.validationErrors: Please fix the validation errors before saving.
messages.invalidUrl: Invalid redirect URL. Must be a valid http/https URL.
messages.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number (7-15 digits)
